body:
im sad to say that eds leaveing avicus im ed right here but i was banned from the website for spam topics but as im leaving i thought it would be ok thank u for all the staff my favrute and the 1 who i think is most responsible is Theromantrident and i thank u all my friend xxmaddyxx funny. lilywest kind. jannerboy friendly.brian37er OP.
theromantrident relible kind. thank you Ivycode for the server i might join when the server changes and i can see new people :) thank u for the memories

replies.body: Well you have less than 20 posts and only one day of playing time, compared to the players who are always on Skype or TS and have 1500 posts and 30 days of playing time. You probably aren't as well known since you weren't as active. I'm not saying that it detracts from peoples' opinions about you but it will be a little more awkward saying goodbye to someone you don't know very well.
